summary: Join and follow this community through its trials and rewards into an inevitable future no one had expected.
descriptionHtml:
Game:Skyrim
Mod Name:Washita: The Series
Version:
Contact Info:
Source:
Author(s):gwaynem

A mother and son held in slavery by a lunatic. A small community with an astounding secret, promising young dragons, or so they thought. Dragons give their lives to cover-up another secret and deception looms, turning friends into enemies.
Dragons fighting dragons while the small community strives to rebuild itself through its mining efforts. Slaves become leaders and perhaps a future Dragonborn. The only entrance into their community is through a cave.
Join and follow this community through its trials and rewards into an inevitable future no one had expected.
In the last segment their little community moves outside of Washita and into the wide open countryside where the struggle continues until its final conclusion, dinner party, and possible wedding.
______________________________________________________________________________
Features:
-Series items picked up can be found in the main house at the start of each segment. Just look for Merca's place which is also the player house.
-Two essential follower choices. One of which is a main character and potential marriage partner.
-Enhanced Summonable Ancient Hero Spell
-Dragon Flesh Spell
-Enhanced weaponery and armor
-Partial series young follower Dragon
-Many quests
-Most attention paid to storyline and quests
-Six segment series is progressive
-New and enhanced textures
-Retain the Staff of The Storm Wall
-Return to help Heroes at Sovngarde
-Plays over three Worlds
-Large Manor has two secret areas and a locked wall safe
-Large bathroom
-Wedding discussion
-Quests begin at game startup with map markers
________________________________________________________________________
Suggestions:
-Character Makeover Mod
________________________________________________________________________
Requirements:
-Be sure you're playing only one .esp at a time.
______________________________________________________________________________
Known Issues:
-The location arrow is offset when traveling back to the ext. Washita World.
______________________________________________________________________________
Permissions:
-Download and play. (For those who enjoy the game.)
______________________________________________________________________________
Thanks To:
Credits:

-Boy's Armor by Steve's Children's Armor: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43413/
-Exterior world by hyperactivechild (Terrain added): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29696/
-Converted by Tamira:
*Stroti Resource Pack for Skyrim:
Aladins Lamp: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35359/
Globes: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35312/
Gramophone: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35943/
Sundial: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35985/
Telescope: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35308/
*Music Instruments:
Guitar: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/38058/
Lute: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/38045/
Lyre: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/38036/
*Strotis Manor Resource for Skyrim: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/42793
*Strotis Organ for Skyrim: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/41087
-Converted by bruce142:
*Stroti Bathroom: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35838/

Being disabled, it's hard for me to even get out or do anything. Bethesda has allowed me the opportunity to do something I enjoy. For that I am grateful. Thank you. It's been work changing over from Oblivion to Skyrim, but it's been fun even though my disability interferes from time to time. The sad part is that it's done, so I'm considering continuing it on another level on a single .esp.
______________________________________________________________________________
Disclaimer:
-This free to play work comes as-is without any guarantee. I also have no need for any feedback or postings.
author: gwaynem
